alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 9:21PM CDT until March 24 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 920 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Etta, or near New Albany, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, New Albany, Ripley, Baldwyn, Jumpertown, Thrashers, Hinkle, Keownville, Wheeler, Dumas, Rienzi, Kossuth, Shari, Graham, Jericho, Collinstown, Biggersville, Pumpkin Center and Jobes. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
